title: What goes well with these fonts?
content: I'm using Eames (House Industries) for body text, and Trade Gothic Bold Condensed (No. 20) for headers. What do you think is a good font for the main title? Something that plays well with these two. Thanks in advance.
author: omfaonline

comments.content:
I would stick with a variation on one of those two. You could choose something from the late 19c or even look at Franklin but older faces seem to lack refinement. Keep it simple and remember the scale changes the type entirely. You have all the Eames faces and tracking and kerning to play with too.

J

Thank you for your reply. Do you think something like [House Script or House Casual](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724172028/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/signpainter/viewfonts) would work with them? Or perhaps something handwritten in the same vein as the House scripts?
